title: New Details About Halo Infinite's Xbox Series X Delay - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.19.20
description:
Blessing and Gary Whitta dive deep into the new details surrounding the delay of Halo Infinite.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:53 - Housekeeping
DC FanDome is SATURDAY, and we’re treating it like Greg Miller’s personal E3. Greg and the Kinda Funny crew will be on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames all day long reacting to the panels for Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, WB Montreal’s game, the Snyder cut, and every other DC movie. It all starts at 10 am PT, so don’t miss it!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mohammed Mohammed
Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:32 - Halo Infinite’s Development has reportedly been hindered By Outsourcing
00:19:19 - A Visual One: Microsoft has revealed the Xbox Series X dashboard
00:27:38 - Oculus VR Will Start Requiring Facebook Accounts, and Users Aren't Happy
00:33:48 - FIFA 21 Won't Feature Cross-Play, Even Across Console Generations
00:34:30 - “FIFA 21 announced today that while you'll get a free upgrade from ps4 to ps5 and from xbox one to Series X, that no cross platform OR cross generational play will be supported…” - Deric
00:44:30 - Sega is focusing more on ports after the success of Persona 4 on Steam
00:47:40 - Could we be getting Prince of Persia Remake?
00:50:36 -  Doordash 
00:51:57 - Out today 
 Reader mail   -
00:53:21 - “Do flight simulators just get a pass from nearly everyone?” - NanoBiologist
00:59:39 - Squad Up: Jeff Collins - PS4 - Masaru702
01:00:09 - You‘re Wrong
01:04:27 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Greg
